name: SeniorShoppingHours
0:
”Alexa, Open Senior shopping hours”
”Alexa, launch Senior shopping hours”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: senior shopping hours
des:
The "Senior Shopping Hours" provides information on shopping time information meant for Seniors and Care Givers due to COVID- 19. 
Because of panic shopping, which has left many store shelves empty, at-risk groups including seniors have had difficulty getting supplies. 

The shopping hours information in this skill, which is updated frequently, will be helpful for Seniors, Caregivers to validate the information before planning shopping to retail stores.

The list includes - King Soopers, Target, Safeway, Sam's Club, Aldi, Trader Joe's, Walmart, Walgreens, Whole Foods Market, Costco Wholesale, Dollar General, Big Lots, Albertsons, Balducci's, BJ's Wholesale Club, Fareway Meat and Grocery, Fresh Market, Fresco y Mas, Giant Food, Mother's Market, Harveys Supermarket, Publix, Schnucks, Sedabo's Supermarket, Smith's Food and Drug Store, Vallarta Supermarket, Winn Dixie, etc.

The user can say,-"Alexa, launch Senior shopping hours", or "Alexa, Ask Senior shopping hours at target what is the timing for senior".



For feedback and questions, please write to us at alexa@nectarspot.com.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
